entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TestGlobalPropertyFlowInSolution failed in CI with UnauthorizedAccessException #27708
  • Net 7 sdk build freezes computer #27697
  • dotnet run error error CS1001: Identifier expected #27687
  • Perf degradation in .NET 7 SDK preview 5 #27686
  • [NetSDKE2E]With .NET 7 RC2 SDK, run failed for .NET 7 winforms/wpf. #27685

PullRequests

Created

  • Look for VSTest artifacts in net7.0 directory for source-build #27716
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Retarget MSBuildSDKResolver #27714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #27712
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #27711
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #27710
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Do not sign test packages #27707
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove various timeouts #27699
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch
  • Fixup PR and official build issues #27698
    Area-Infrastructure, DO NOT MERGE

Merged

  • Update our helix pre-download code to try to pre-download for non-windows legs as well. #27306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove timeouts from tests #27700
    Area-Watch
  • do not emit diagnostic when attribute argument is internal type #27648
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Update branding to 3.1.424 #27701
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.110 #27702
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.305 #27703
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.402 #27704
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove assumption that dotnet-watch impl is only executed from dotnet process to allow testing #27637
    Area-Watch
  • Testfix: Virtualize templating settings folder during tests #27688
  • Fix br compression size regression in Blazor WASM #27659
    arch-wasm, Area-AspNetCore
  • Remove non-existent project path from dotnet-watch.slnf #26401
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Apply the same editorconfig rules to TemplateEngine parts as dotnet/templating repo #27611
    Area-Compatibility
  • [main] Disable publishing artifacts at build task of template engine job to fix the failure of uploading artifacts in CI #27679
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx]Disable publishing artifacts at build task of template engine job to fix the failure of uploading artifacts in CI #27674
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1985587 #27667
  • Target net7.0 in additional projects #27012
    Area-Infrastructure
  • 8.0 alpha branding #27189
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add output DebugSymbolsFiles to ResolvePackageAssets #27580
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove timeout, reenable ProjectReferences_Graph test #27657
    Area-Watch
  • Use architecture specific DOTNET_ROOT veriable name #27566
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ownership of dotnet watch #26669
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implements standard dotnet options for controlling output in dotnet new #27628
    area: dotnet new
  • Bugfix: Report error on conditional params authoring errors #27684
